Along with the evaluation of convalescent plasma from blood donors, the plasma industry could take future steps, manufacturing concentrated hyperimmune globulin preparations that contain standardized antibody doses and could provide a further reach in terms of health setting administering therapy.
34 As a whole, the promising results of convalescent plasma transfusion could change the course of COVID-19. The formulation, namely convalescent plasma or hyperimmune globulin, as well as the optimal time frame, remain to be identified in the future.
